entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of light snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
